```
     when [up arrow v] key pressed
      change y by (10)

      when [down arrow v] key pressed
      change y by (-10)

      when [right arrow v] key pressed
      change x by (10)

      when [left arrow v] key pressed
      change x by (-10) 
    ```

```
     when [up arrow v] key pressed
      change y by (10)
      if <touching (Star v) ?> then
      say (timer) for (2) seconds 
    ```

```
     when [up arrow v] key pressed

      change y by (-10)

      if <touching (Star v) ?> then
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      go to (random position v) 
    ```

```
     define check if won
      if <touching (Star v) ?> then
      say (timer) for (2) seconds 
    ```

```
     when [up arrow v] key pressed
      change y by (10)
      check if won

      when [down arrow v] key pressed
      change y by (-10)
      check if won

      when [right arrow v] key pressed
      change x by (10)
      check if won

      when [left arrow v] key pressed
      change x by (-10)
      check if won 
    ```

```
     define check if won
      if <touching (Star v) ?> then
      say (round(timer)) for (2) seconds 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      set size to (50) %
      repeat (10)
      change size by (10)
      end
      wait (1) seconds
      repeat (10)
      change size by (-10)
      end 
    ```

```
     define inflate
      repeat (10)
      change size by (10)
      end 
    ```

```
     define deflate
      repeat (10)
      change size by (-10)
      end 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      set size to (50) %
      inflate
      wait (1) seconds
      deflate 
    ```

```
     define inflate (n) times
      repeat (n)
      change size by (10) 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      set size to (50) %
      inflate () times
      wait (1) seconds
      deflate () times 
    ```

```
     define walk (m) steps on (n) feet
      switch costume to (n)
      repeat (m)
      move (1) steps 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      walk (30) steps on (4) feet
      walk (30) steps on (2) feet 
    ```
